<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flensing Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=1953) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57)

**Prerequisites**
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1950)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a [Double Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=356), and both attacks hit the target.

</column>

---

When you hit with both attacks with Double Slice, you flense the target, making it bleed and creating a weak spot. The target takes 1d8 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) per weapon damage die of whichever of the weapons you used that has the most weapon damage dice (maximum 4d8 for a [_major striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon). The target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), and its resistances to any physical damage types are reduced by 5; these two effects last until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Flensing Slice
requirement: Your last action was a  Double Slice , and both attacks hit the target.
